name: Briel
description:
Connect to towers to defend from incoming figures that want to harm your home!

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 in less than 48 hours, the theme was "joined together" and in this game you need to join to towers to shoot and join to the base to heal it.

The objective is to get a high score, but you can also use your hard-earned points to heal your base or upgrade your towers!
